title: Can I change the capitalization of my name?
body: I read you can change the capitalization or spaces of your name one time free, but I cant seem to figure out how to do it exactly I want to change my summoner name to Daddy of The Lag instead of what it is currently which is Daddy of the lag, any help would be greatly appreciated thank you!

replies.body:
As *Deep Terror Nami* mentioned, you can write into our support specialists about this. We offer this as a one-time exception, though, so be sure this the name you want to keep before you do it! :)

Let me know if you have any questions.
Thank you, I really appreciate it!

You'll want to submit a [Support Ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) with the subject line **SUBJECT: Summoner Name Change**.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752814-Summoner-Name-FAQ#h1q5
